title: Introducing: Dama Scout
body:
This debut single from Glasgow/London outfit **Dama Scout** showcases colossal potential.

The production feels perhaps a little raw at times, but the songwriting and ideas are all there. Managing to merge Cocteau Twin levels of gracefulness with a blistering sort of energy usually more associated with the likes of Sleater-Kinney. Check out _Forget It’s Good_ below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.

Managing to merge Cocteau Twin levels of gracefulness with a blistering sort of energy usually more associated with the likes of Sleater-Kinney. Check out Forget It’s Good \[…\]
